entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:16 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 12:16 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
